resources.string: You will receive a verification code. Standard text and carrier rates apply.
A verification email will be sent to this address. Please make sure to enter your email correctly.
What to know about signing up with a Phone Number?
What to know about signing up with an Email Address?

By signing up using a phone number, it can be less secure than using an email address. This is because it is possible to change your phone number. Please make sure to update your account before you change your phone number.

By signing up using an email, it is generally the more secure option as you always keep your email address and it never gets passed to someone else unlike a phone number. Please make sure to have a strong password on your email in order to make sure no one can reset any passwords.
Would you like to send another verification code? Standard text and carrier rates apply.
